mcq.statement: Point out the correct one: A pair of shoe for his first born, mehrunnisa, had cost him one rupee., A pair of shoes for his first born, mehrunnisa, had cost him one rupee., A pair of shoes for his first born, mehrunnisa, had costed him one rupee., None of these

options.a: A pair of shoe for his first born, mehrunnisa, had cost him one rupee.
options.b: A pair of shoes for his first born, mehrunnisa, had cost him one rupee.
options.c: A pair of shoes for his first born, mehrunnisa, had costed him one rupee.
